title: minecraft 让dispenser射-w-得更快
author: green丶bastard
txt_content:
快到头了。。不能再快了 一般的用那种快速脉冲会萎的 边上加个红石火把即可

http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMjgyMjQ3MjYw/v.swf

replies.author: motianjun4
replies.txt_content: 现在的发射器可以自动连续发射了吧

replies.txt_content:
